tool.name: xmlstarlet
tool.description: convert a metadata XML file in one standard to another

param.name: input
param.label: input xml file to convert
param.help: A xml file corresponding to a xsd schema you want to convert in another.

param.name: xsl
param.label: input xsl convertion file
param.help: A xsl file describing the mapping between a first xsd specification to another.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool converts a xml file to another using a xsl coversion file to specify the translation to be done, from a wsd schema to another.
-----
**Inputs**
A xml metadata file using a standard (for exemple EML, ISO19115,...) and a xsl file describing the mapping between the standard terms from input file and terms of the searched output standard.
-----
**Outputs**
A xml metadata file using a new standard (for example ISO19115, EML, ...).
